QRL.CO.IN
HOME ABOUT FAUCET CHAIN

Tools for the Future

Open and Secure

Building open source and free tools to interact with the QRL blockchain. Using advanced cryptography and quantum resistant systems to secure the future. Dedicated to bringing innovation and future-minded thinking to the masses with easy to digest systems and tools built off the QRL blockchain project.


Strong Cryptography

Using quantum resistant cryptography provides security today. We aim to bring this security with a focus on ease of use. Everyone deserves the highest level of security possible.

Innovative Solutions

Bridging the gap between ultra-secure technology and real world use-cases. Using the distributed, immutable ledger to power a fleet of tools that will change the future.


QRL.co.in is not an official project of the QRL team, instead it's a project put together for things built on top the official project. For now we're workling on a faucet to help promote the QRL blockchain getting coins into more users hands. If you would like to contribute building the next cool tools, Get In Touch!

contact

QRL.co.in was started with big ambitions to bring secure tools to the masses. We are excited about future thinking projects and innovation that propels everyone into a better future.

We are looking for others that share this vision. If you would like to join our team and help build the next new great thing, drop us a line. Currently this is small focused group of advocates pushing secure cryptography and radical ideals into functional tools for the masses.

Email: info@qrl.co.in
